snippet: A group of Catholics in the archdiocese in Atlanta had asked that Archbishop Wilton D. Gregory sell the more than 6,000-square-foot home in keeping with the tone of austerity set by Pope Francis.
abstract: Archbishop Wilton D Gregory of Atlanta says he will sell $2.2 million home just three months after he moved in, in hopes of appeasing angry parishioners; group of Catholics in archdiocese had asked that he sell the more than 6,000-square-foot home in keeping with tone of austerity set by Pope Francis.
lead_paragraph: A group of Catholics in the archdiocese in Atlanta had asked that Archbishop Wilton D. Gregory sell the more than 6,000-square-foot home in keeping with the tone of austerity set by Pope Francis.

headline.main: Archbishop Says He Plans to Sell $2 Million Home
headline.print_headline: Archbishop Says He Plans to Sell $2 Million Home
